title: Making a Team, Bronze 3-silver 1
body:
Hey guys,
if anybody is interested in joining my new team that im going to create today, i will pick a role according to what you guys want to play. I need 4 people to join and wouldn't mind a Sub/Fill. 


I believe i could make this team work if we played the right composition, after watching a few games in worlds i am to realize that skill is not necessary and with the right champions you can win any game.
My name is Descendit ill be avaliable from 3:50pm-12:00pm every day if anybody wants to join. if we get enough players ill create a schedule. 
(Edit): we can discuss the team name together


THANKS Descendit {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: I would really like to be in a ranked team was silver last season ..
Hey Descendit, I have also created a ranked team with Pessimistlad and looking for 3 more ppl to fill out if your interested in joining. Feel free to add either of us and we can go from there.

I'm currently in B2. I've been a one trick pony with Zed with very good success, but I can also use Talon and Yasuo,  and am currently learning Ahri. I used to main botlane (both roles), with my ADC pool being Vayne, Twitch, Corki, Caitlyn and Jinx. Support pool is Thresh, Nami and Braum. Here is my op.gg:

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=UnholyDemigod

Hey M7, 
Im pretty keen to join a ranked team. I want those season reward wards haha. Add me in game if youre still keen. I pref mid/adc but can thresh sup :)
